product_name: CamelBak Molokai Paddling Hydration Pack - 70 fl. oz.
long_description: Quick access to front cargo pockets and 70 fl. oz. of hands-free hydration make the CamelBak Molokai(TM) Hydration Pack ideal for enjoying long distances on your stand up paddleboard. 70 fl. oz. Antidote(TM) reservoir is equipped with the Quick Link(TM) connection system for hassle-free removal of the drinking tube. Big Bite(TM) valve is ergonomically positioned for easy drinking. Wide-mouth port cuts weight and makes it easy to fill and clean the reservoir; quick-snap cap tightens in just a quarter turn. You can easily fill reservoir without removing it from the hydration pack. Harness adjusts to fit the body closely and stay out of the way of your paddle stroke. Open mesh back panel enhances ventilation and comfort. The Molokai is constructed out of materials designed to be very comfortable in a wet environment. Stretchy storage pockets let you bring along an inflatable PFD, a small waterproof electronics case, sunscreen or snacks (not included). The CamelBak Molokai Hydration Pack includes a safety whistle and paddle holster.
short_description: Quick access to front cargo pockets and 70 fl. oz. of hands-free hydration make the CamelBak Molokai(TM) Hydration Pack ideal for enjoying long distances on your stand up paddleboard.
